definition: Wei (220-265) and Jin (265-420) dynasties

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
tower over a palace gateway (old)
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
to move forward/to promote/to advance
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui

sentences.english: Later, when metaphysics and buddhism arose in Wei Jin period, the shape and bearing of an object.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉時期玄佛興起，理溝通了形與神。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter mainly discusses its transfer during Wei and Jin dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要討論相和歌辭在魏晉時期的轉型問題。

sentences.english: The aesthetic value-orientation of literature in Wei-Jin limes and the Six Dynasties obviously advocated "purity".
sentences.chinese: 魏晉六朝文學審美價值取向明顯尚清。

sentences.english: Taoism has its beginning in Han-Wei-Jin period.
sentences.chinese: 漢魏晉乃道教開端的時代。

sentences.english: Jikang is a famous philosopher in Wei-jin Period of China.
sentences.chinese: 嵇康是中國古代魏晉時期著名哲學家。

sentences.english: The forth chapter discusses the development and transformation of the imitating ancient poetry in Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四章論述魏晉南北朝擬“古詩”的發展流變。

sentences.english: Luji is one important writer and theorist of arts during Wei and Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 陸機是我國魏晉之際的重要作家和文學理論家。

sentences.english: The influence of metaphysics on poems can be traced back to the Wei and Jin dynasties, when metaphysics coming in- to being.
sentences.chinese: 玄學對詩歌的影響可上推至魏晉之際玄學初起之時。

sentences.english: The system of village started in the Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern dynasties was a great progress of local primary-level organizations.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝時代村的出現是地方基層組織的一大變革。

sentences.english: The argument of norm and nature is the central issue of Wei-Jin metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: “自然”與“名教”之辯是魏晉玄學的中心議題。

sentences.english: It is literature researcher that has first prompted the thesis that scholar-officials in Wei and Jin dynasties valued feelings.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉時期士人的重情是文學研究者首先提出來的。

sentences.english: Weijin and Northern and Southern Dynasties is the prosperous period of the patriarchal clan in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝時期是中國歷史上宗族強盛的時期。

sentences.english: It was inital and taking shape stage about the Peach culture before the Qin Dynasty and Wei Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 先秦至魏晉是桃文化的濫觴和形成期。

sentences.english: The epidemic disease in the Wei, Jin, Sixteen States and Northern Dynasties spread continuously.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉十六國北朝疫病流行呈現出連綿不斷的趨勢。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the Liang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝蕭衍是魏晉南北朝時期梁朝的開國帝王。

sentences.english: In the first chapter, we mainly discuss the state of authors' biography.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要論述魏晉時期作家傳記史料的情況。

definition: the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Han Dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
beginning/origin/to originate/to initiate
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
Eastern or later Han dynasty, 25-220
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
A New Account of the Tales of the World, collection of anecdotes, conversations, remarks etc of historic personalities, compiled and edited by Liu Yiqing 劉義慶|刘义庆[Liu2 Yi4 qing4]
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Gu Kaizhi or Ku K'aichih (346-407), famous painter of Eastern Jin dynasty, one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家

History of the Early Tang Dynasty, sixteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Liu Xu 劉昫|刘昫[Liu2 Xu4] in 945 during Later Jin 後晉|后晋[Hou4 Jin4] of the Five Dynasties, 200 scrolls
Shijing, the Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems and one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1]
